data.title: Top Gun: Maverick (Blu-ray + Digital)
data.meta_description: Shop Top Gun: Maverick (Blu-ray + Digital) at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text: “A high-octane spectacle, the likes of which the world has never seen before,”* Top Gun: Maverick is "the perfect adrenaline rush"** After more than thirty years of service as a top naval aviator, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell (Tom Cruise) is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot. Yet, Maverick must confront the ghosts of his past when he returns to TOP GUN to train a group of elite graduates and comes face-to-face with Lt. Bradshaw (Miles Teller), the son of his former wingman, "Goose". Bitter rivalries ignite as the pilots prepare for a specialized mission, which will require the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it. (*Matt Neglia, Next Best Picture | **Emma Stefansky, Thrillist)
